category.helpText: it is used to group codes in the full codes list to speed up a search of a needed code.

copies.helpText: 0 means infinite. Look for the field below for details of this field value decrease.

description.help_text: Use a format: [#code_id] - to automatically insert another QRpg-code into the text. A click on this code will transfer user to it's description immediately. If you're adding links to mp3-files they will be replaced by a mp3-player automatically. If you add: [loop] - right after a link to a mp3-file, the file will be looped. Use a format: [conversation|user id] - to insert a form for sending a message to the user specified.

description_bad.help_text: Use a format: [#code_id] - to automatically insert another QRpg-code into the text. A click on this code will transfer user to it's description immediately. If you're adding links to mp3-files they will be replaced by a mp3-player automatically. If you add: [loop] - right after a link to a mp3-file, the file will be looped. Use a format: [conversation|user id] - to insert a form for sending a message to the user specified.

qrpg_keys.shownName: User will need all of these QRpg-keys for the result

not_qrpg_keys.shownName: User will need any of these QRpg-keys absent
not_qrpg_keys.helpText: if you need a few keys to be missing altogether, please, make an additional key consisting of the keys and then select it here.

hacking_settings.shownName: And also win in a mini-game

text_to_access.helpText: text can be of any length and content, it will be checked case insensitive.

gives_bad_qrpg_keys.shownName: Unsuccessful scan attempt gives following QRpg-keys

removes_qrpg_keys_user.shownName: Code scan will remove following QRpg-keys from the scanning user

removes_qrpg_keys.shownName: Code scan will remove following QRpg-keys from every user except the scanning one
removes_qrpg_keys.helpText: very convenient for some items mechanics for example: QRpg-code on an item will grant a QRpg-key of this item to the scanning user and will remove it from any other users. This way only one user has control over an item at any particular moment.

removes_copies_of_qrpg_codes.shownName: Code scan will remove one copy from following QRpg-codes
removes_copies_of_qrpg_codes.helpText: rescan by the same user leading to the same result will not remove additional copies.

gives_qrpg_keys.shownName: Code scan will grant following keys to the scanning user

gives_qrpg_keys_for_minutes.helpText: 0 here means forever, and keys will be added to the user application. If more than 0, then keys will not be added to the application.

gives_bank_currency_amount.shownName: Code scan will grant a resource quantity
gives_bank_currency_amount.helpText: can be negative (to remove a resource from player).

gives_bank_currency_total_times.shownName: Do not grant more than N times during the project
gives_bank_currency_total_times.helpText: 0 here means a resource will be granted any number of times.

gives_bank_currency_once_in_minutes.shownName: Do not grant more often than in N minutes

gives_bank_currency_total_times_user.shownName: Do not grant more than N times during the project per user
gives_bank_currency_total_times_user.helpText: 0 here means a resource will be granted to a user any number of times, but no more than "Do not grant more than N times during the project".

gives_bank_currency_once_in_minutes_user.shownName: Do not grant more often than in N minutes per user
gives_bank_currency_once_in_minutes_user.helpText: it's considered a good practice to set more than 0 here to protect data from any connection errors and doubled scans by the same user.
